Classes in com.geoloqi.android.sdk used by com.geoloqi.android.sdk
LQBuild
          This interface defines build constants for the SDK build version strings.
LQException
          This is the base Exception class thrown when a recoverable error is encountered while interacting with the Geoloqi SDK.
LQSession
          LQSession represents a client session for communicating directly with the Geoloqi REST API.
LQSession.OnRunApiRequestListener
          Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when LQSession.runApiRequest(org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpRequestBase, com.geoloqi.android.sdk.LQSession.OnRunApiRequestListener) completes.
LQTracker
          LQTracker is a singleton responsible for queueing location updates and sending them to the server.
LQTracker.LQTrackerProfile
          The profile used to define the behavior of the location tracker.
LQTracker.LQTrackerStatus
          Used to indicate the current status of the location tracker, regardless of the active tracking profile.
 

Classes in com.geoloqi.android.sdk used by com.geoloqi.android.sdk.receiver
LQTracker.LQTrackerProfile
          The profile used to define the behavior of the location tracker.
